data.title: Valerie Parham-Thompson on LinkedIn: Today is my last day at Pythian. Helping to grow the open source database…
data.meta_description: Today is my last day at Pythian. Helping to grow the open source database practice along with smart, engaged colleagues is a highlight of my career. Thank you… | 29 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Today is my last day at Pythian. Helping to grow the open source database practice along with smart, engaged colleagues is a highlight of my career. Thank you to Laine Campbell, Amanda MacDonald, and Pedro Vidigal for the right opportunities at the right times, and special thanks to John Schulz and Michelle (Michal) Kamrat Gutzait for demonstrating what to do with those opportunities. Thank you to all my teammates for being great collaborators. I'm excited about my next challenge, and will look forward to a future time when we can meet at a conference or work together again.
